## master serve

Listen for world connections to the master

### Synopsis

The purpose of the world master service is to coordinate the registered worlds.

```
master serve [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for serve
```

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.master.yaml)
```
